name: SCNPhysicsContact
desc: Detailed information about a contact between two physics bodies in a sceneâ€™s physics simulation.

items.name: var nodeA: SCNNode
items.desc: The node containing the first body in the contact.

items.name: var nodeB: SCNNode
items.desc: The node containing the second body in the contact.

items.name: var contactPoint: SCNVector3
items.desc: The contact point between the two physics bodies, in scene coordinates.

items.name: var contactNormal: SCNVector3
items.desc: The normal vector at the contact point between the two physics bodies, in scene coordinates.

items.name: var collisionImpulse: CGFloat
items.desc: The force over time of the collision, in newton-seconds.

items.name: var penetrationDistance: CGFloat
items.desc: The distance of overlap, in units of scene coordinate space, between the two physics bodies.
